title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta. Combine all ingredients.

title: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry
instructions: Cook chicken. Add spices and coconut milk. Simmer until done.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Tasty beef tacos with fresh toppings
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Serve in tortillas with toppings.

title: Veggie Stir-Fry
description: Healthy and colorful vegetable stir-fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and soy sauce.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes for a perfect breakfast
instructions: Mix ingredients. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and cheese.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Classic grilled cheese sandwich
instructions: Assemble sandwich with cheese between bread slices. Grill until golden brown.

title: Beef Stroganoff
description: Creamy beef and mushroom dish
instructions: Sauté beef and onion. Add mushrooms, broth, and sour cream. Season with paprika.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlicky shrimp pasta
instructions: Sauté shrimp and garlic in butter. Toss with cooked linguine, lemon juice, and parsley.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Simple and fresh Italian salad
instructions: Layer sliced tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

title: Margarita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Top pizza dough with sauce, cheese, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and bake.

title: Beef Wellington
description: Tender beef wrapped in puff pastry
instructions: Sear beef, wrap in mushroom mixture and prosciutto, then puff pastry. Bake until golden.

title: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream
instructions: Dip ladyfingers in espresso. Layer with mascarpone mixture. Dust with cocoa powder.

title: Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken
description: Juicy roasted chicken with a bright lemon garlic flavor
instructions: Rub chicken with lemon, garlic, and herbs. Roast until golden and cooked through.

title: Vegetarian Chili
description: Hearty and flavorful vegetarian chili
instructions: Sauté vegetables, add beans, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer until flavors meld.

title: Ratatouille
description: Classic French vegetable stew
instructions: Layer vegetables in baking dish with herbs. Bake until tender and flavorful.

title: Lobster Bisque
description: Rich and creamy lobster soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables, add lobster shells, tomato paste, and broth. Simmer, blend, and add cream and brandy.

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
description: Savory beef and broccoli stir-fry with a flavorful sauce
instructions: Sear beef, stir-fry with broccoli and sauce until thickened.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy chicken and pasta dish with a cheesy Alfredo sauce
instructions: Sauté chicken, cook pasta. Make sauce with cream, cheese, and garlic. Combine all.

title: Sushi Rolls
description: Homemade sushi rolls with fresh fish and vegetables
instructions: Prepare sushi rice, assemble rolls with fish and vegetables. Cut and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy and flavorful mushroom risotto
instructions: Sauté mushrooms, onion, garlic. Add rice, wine, broth. Stir until creamy. Finish with cheese.

title: Beef Bourguignon
description: Classic French beef stew cooked in red wine
instructions: Sear beef, cook vegetables, deglaze with wine, simmer in broth until tender.

title: Chicken Parmesan
description: Crispy breaded chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese
instructions: Coat chicken in breadcrumbs, fry, top with sauce and cheese, bake until bubbly.

title: Pad Thai
description: Popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with a sweet and tangy sauce
instructions: Stir-fry noodles, shrimp, tofu, and sauce. Add bean sprouts, peanuts, and lime before serving.

title: Homemade Macaroni and Cheese
description: Comforting and creamy macaroni and cheese
instructions: Cook pasta. Make cheese sauce with milk, cheese, and roux. Bake with breadcrumbs on top.

title: Pulled Pork Sandwiches
description: Slow-cooked, tender pulled pork piled high on a bun
instructions: Season pork, slow-cook until tender, shred and mix with barbecue sauce. Serve on buns with coleslaw and pickles.

title: Gnocchi with Pesto Sauce
description: Soft potato dumplings with a fresh basil pesto sauce
instructions: Cook gnocchi. Blend basil, pine nuts, cheese, garlic, oil for pesto. Toss with gnocchi.

title: Coq au Vin
description: Traditional French chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms and onions
instructions: Brown chicken, cook bacon, sauté vegetables, deglaze with wine, braise until tender.

title: Shakshuka
description: Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce
instructions: Sauté vegetables, add spices and tomatoes, simmer, crack eggs into sauce, cook until set.

title: Lamb Biryani
description: Fragrant and flavorful Indian rice dish with tender spiced lamb
instructions: Marinate lamb, cook with spices, layer with parboiled rice, cook until tender.
